mapper.select: SELECT N.RW, N.F_NO, N.NICKNAME, N.F_TITLE, N.F_CONTENT, N.F_CREATE_DATE, N.F_MODIFY_DATE, N.F_HIT, N.F_IP FROM (SELECT ROW_NUMBER() OVER(ORDER BY F_NO DESC) AS RW, F_NO, NICKNAME, F_TITLE, F_CONTENT, F_CREATE_DATE, F_MODIFY_DATE, F_HIT, F_IP FROM F_BOARD) N WHERE N.RW BETWEEN #{begin} AND #{end}
mapper.insert:
SELECT F_BOARD_SEQ.NEXTVAL FROM DUAL
INSERT INTO F_BOARD (F_NO, NICKNAME, F_TITLE, F_CONTENT, F_CREATE_DATE, F_MODIFY_DATE, F_HIT, F_IP) VALUES (#{fNo}, #{nickname}, #{fTitle}, #{fContent}, SYSDATE, SYSDATE, 0, #{fIp})
